oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words and Sentences. Given by =girri-sse (L VII.-1. 6041-6044). Includes the sentence 'I come from the strong water', meaning the Breakwater Convict Station. 1) Date on p.6042v: 3 December, 2) This story is found in Book VII-1.
